TypeSignature.Value: public delegate void InkCanvasGestureEventHandler(object sender, InkCanvasGestureEventArgs e);
.class public auto ansi sealed InkCanvasGestureEventHandler extends System.MulticastDelegate

Docs.summary: Represents the method that will handle the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas.Gesture"> event of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas>.
